akn:content.akn:p: The Commission is charged with the continuance, further development, and improvement of the public vehicle-for-hire industry within the District, and for the overall regulation of limousines, sedans, taxicabs, taxicab companies, taxicab fleets, and taxicab associations.

A majority of the appointed Commissioners shall constitute a quorum for transacting business and for taking official action or votes; provided, that public hearings may be conducted without the presence of a quorum.

The Commission may issue orders which shall have binding effect in exercising any authority conferred by this section.
Appeals from final decisions of the Commission may be taken to the Office of Administrative Hearings, pursuant to Chapter 18A of Title 2 [ยง 2-1831.01 et seq.].
